title: Create FO-01 main page
description:
Create the main page that mounts FOExperience.

File: app/fo-01/page.tsx

Simple page component that:
- Imports FOExperience from ./components/fo-experience
- Renders FOExperience as the main content
- Full height container

Reference: app/chat-survey/page.tsx for pattern
acceptance_criteria: Page loads, FOExperience renders, full onboarding flow works
